paper_title: Maximal dimension of affine subspaces of specific matrices
abstract: For every $n \in \mathbb{N}$ and every field $K$, let $N(n,K)$ be the set of the nilpotent $(n \times n)$-matrices over $K$. Moreover, let $R(n) $ be the set of the normal $(n \times n)$-matrices. In this short note we prove that the maximal dimension of an affine subspace in $N(n,K)$ is $ \frac{n(n-1)}{2}$ and that the maximal dimension of an affine subspace in $R(n)$ is $n$.
